mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fitness_course (title, content, num, key_word) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{num}, #{key_word})
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM fitness_course w WHERE w.delete_status = '1'

SELECT w.id id, w.title title, w.content content, w.num num, w.key_word key_word, date_format(w.create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime FROM fitness_course w WHERE w.delete_status = '1' ORDER BY w.id DESC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE fitness_course SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, num = #{num}, key_word = #{key_word} WHERE id = #{id}
